roadmap: WAF tamper, HTTP Auth Bruteforce, Arabic translation, SOAP injection, Command line interface, Databases: Access MongoDb and Neo4j
news: [Feature] Contribute and translate jSQL for example into Arabic: Click on the top right button to show advanced settings and open menu [Community], choose a language using [I help translate jSQL] and translate some text then click on [Send]. Your translation will be integrated to the next release by the developer
[Release] Version 0.76 includes Czech translation and support of SQLite
[Pending] MS-Access support, Restful and SOAP injection
